markdown:
| icon           = poe2 ring_silver_jade_01 icon.png
| description    = This ring was discovered at the home of the dwarf alchemist Nikolya Volk after her infamous disappearance. When her creditors scoured her house for valuables, the ring was sitting on the entry table. A small scrap of parchment next to it bore Nikolya's handwriting. It appeared to have been torn from a larger volume, possibly a diary.

"...where the birds sing a pretty song," it read.

The band of this mysterious ring is of an unknown metal, but the stone set in its center is almost certainly jade. The gemstone bears an ancient pictograph depicting an owl. Paradoxically, the Engwithan word for "ibis" is embossed around the band. Donning the ring briefly fills the ears with the sounds of birdsong and running water.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Fingers
| item_type      = Ring
| item_category  = Accessory
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = yes
| value          = 310
| shop_value     = 1550
| range          =

| item_bonuses   = Flame Ward;Overwhelm
| enchantments   = 
| rel_quests     = 
| rel_items      = 
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = Ring_U_Ibis
| location       = * Dropped by [Lord Admiral Imp](/lordAdmiralImp/) in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), who appears during the task [Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp](/bountyLordAdmiralImp/).
| guid           = 2510a73f-93b8-4e63-adab-82c8194ff000
}}
'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Ring}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Notes

* To clarify, [Overwhelm](/overwhelm/) is a negative effect, and one of the few disadvantageous effects found on items in ''Deadfire''. The [Will](/will/) debuff and interrupt is applied to the wearer when they receive a [Burn](/burn/) damage crit, or a crit from a [Fire](/listOfKeywordsFire/)-keyword ability.
